content:
can take as much as 30 seconds or more. For this reason it is best to
initialize the random seed at startup, when the application is still
very small. egg-accept-errors bool 1 When this is true, certain kinds of recoverable errors (not syntax
errors) in an egg file will be allowed and ignored when an egg file is
loaded. When it is false, only perfectly pristine egg files may be
loaded. egg-alpha-mode enum blend Specifies the alpha mode to apply when the alpha specification "on"
appears in the egg file (or when a primitive is implicitly transparent,
because of a <RGBA> that involves a non-unity alpha, or because of
a four-channel texture. egg-combine-geoms bool 0 Set this true to combine sibling GeomNodes into a single GeomNode,
when possible. This usually shouldn't be necessary, since the egg loader
does a pretty good job of combining these by itself. egg-consider-fans bool 0 Set this true to enable the egg mesher to consider making triangle
